column5: How many other people count or keep track of days until going back or is this a personal obsession?
7 months 3 weeks, not that I'm counting.

I have an excel spread sheet that I use to calculate group expenses. In it I also have a date of departure. The sheet automatically calculates the number of days until we leave. So, no I do not count the days, Excel does it for me. I just look at the results.
I always keep track. Now let me think here....tomorrows Thursday..that means I have 2 more days to wait till I'm catching Walleye.
I may not count it right to the day, but I do use my trip to time the year, Michigan firearm deer season is the halfway mark to my next fishing trip, for example
